Package com.ibm.webest.persistence.service

Interface Summary
AuthenticationRoles Holds the names of the user roles.
CalculationFacadeLocal Provides functionality to retrieve calculation relevant data from the database.
CalculationFacadeRemote Provides functionality to retrieve calculation relevant data from the database.
EstimateFacadeLocal facade local interface for estimate
EstimateFacadeRemote facade remote interface for estimate
This class provides the functionality to create, edit, delete, cloning and the access of Estimates.
ProjectEnvironmentFacadeLocal Facade for entity ProjectEnvironment.
ProjectEnvironmentFacadeRemote Facade for entity ProjectEnvironment.
SolutionFacadeLocal facade local interface for solution
SolutionFacadeLocal includes the query to Solution from SolutionFacadeRemote.
SolutionFacadeRemote facade remote interface for solution
SolutionFacadeRemote includes the query to Solution.
UserFacadeLocal Local Facade Interface for entity User.
UserFacadeRemote Remote Facade Interface for entity User.
 

Class Summary
Cloner The Cloner class provides functionality for cloning Estimates and Solutions.
TemplateValuesConverter Utility class to convert an instance of TemplateValues to another, e.g. to convert a Template to a ProjectEnvironment.
 

Exception Summary
CloneException This Exception is thrown if an object could not be cloned.
DatabaseConnectionException Exception thrown if an error occurs while connection to the database.
EntityNotFoundException Thrown if an entity is not found in database.
PersistenceException Exception thrown in case of an error on the persistence layer.
QueryException Exception thrown while trying to execute an invalid query.
